articles.author: THE ASSOCIATED PRESS
articles.title: UK identifies 4 cases of new mpox variant, the first cluster outside Africa - The Associated Press
articles.description: British health officials say they have identified four cases of the new, more infectious version of mpox that first emerged in Congo, marking the first time the variant has caused a cluster of illness outside of Africa. Scientists said the risk to the public …
articles.content: LONDON (AP) British health officials say they have identified four cases of the new, more infectious version of mpox that first emerged in Congo, marking the first time the variant has caused a clust… [+1810 chars]
